name: haxe-crypto
description: Hurlant crypto library ported to haxe: secure random, tls, md2, md5, sha1, sha224, sha256, xtea, hex, base64, hmac, tlsprf, blowfish, des, tripledes, aes, cfb8, cfb, ctr, ofb, ecb, bigint, big integers, rsa, pem, rot13, uuid, utf8, utf16
releasenote: Fixed casting problem for Haslink target
